<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Furious Grab](/Feats.aspx?ID=163) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 92 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Requirements**
Your last action was a successful Strike, and either you have a hand free or your Strike used a grapple weapon.

</column>

---

You grab your foe while it’s distracted by your attack. The foe you hit becomes grabbed, as if you had succeeded at an Athletics check to Grapple the foe.
